subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Joe Maddon, the manager of the Tampa Bay Rays, grew up with a father named Joe, who was a plumber. And despite leading his team in the World Series, Joe the manager follows politics keenly.
snippet: Joe Maddon, the manager of the Tampa Bay Rays, grew up with a father named Joe, who was a plumber. And despite leading his team in the World Series, Joe the manager follows politics keenly.
